extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    6.0 units from FREN212 or FREN220 or FREN221 and registration in a FREN plan.
Exclusion     No more than 3.0 units from FREN390; FREN490

basic.description: A study of discourse on and by women in representative works (primarily the novel). Travaux pratiques may include essays and tests.  Given jointly with FREN 490/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: La femme et/dans la littérature
